author: Simon Difford
description: An Old Fashioned Whiskey Cocktail made with Underburg bitters.
name: Southgate
recipeIngredient: 60 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice)
